file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-07-04 - CONFIG-2 - SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. The service-door trim shroud assembly is installed in the passenger cabin, at zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEM- 25-23-07-000-802-A EMB-135 BLY - REMOVAL ACFT MODEL(S) SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEM- 25-23-07-400-802-A EMB-135 BLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-07-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-006-A (1) Remove the sealant from around the base of the door lower trim shroud (17) and the base of the aft vertical trim shroud (20) (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Remove the acoustic cover (7) that is attached with Velcro fasteners. (3) At the door forward vertical trim shroud (1), remove the screws (4) and washers (5) that attach the handle (6). (4) Remove the screws (3) and washers (2) that attach the door forward vertical trim shroud (1). (5) Remove the seal (8) from the door forward vertical trim shroud (1). (6) Remove the screws (9) and (12) and washers (10) and (11) that attach the door lower vertical trim shroud (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (7) Remove the screws (14) and (16) and washers (13) and (15) that attach the door lower vertical trim shroud (17). Refer to VIEW B, Figure 401. (8) Remove the seal (18) from the door lower vertical trim shroud (17). (9) Remove the screws (22) and washers (21) that attach the aft vertical trim shroud (20). (10) Remove the seals (19) and (25) from the aft vertical trim shroud (20). (11) Remove the screws (24) and washers (23) that attach the lateral of the aft vertical trim shroud (20). (12) Remove the screws (26) and (29) and washers (27) and (30) that attach the door upper trim shroud (28). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Service-Door Trim Shroud Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 28. DOOR UPPER TRIM SHROUD 29. SCREW 25. SEAL 30. WASHER 27. WASHER A 26. SCREW ZONE 2. WASHER 232 3. SCREW 5. WASHER 1. DOOR FORWARD VERTICAL TRIM 20. AFT VERTICAL SHROUD TRIM SHROUD 8. SEAL 4 SCREW 6. HANDLE 7. ACOUSTIC 21. WASHER COVER 23. WASHER 10. WASHER 11. WASHER 22. SCREW 24. SCREW 12. SCREW B 14. SCREW (2) 19. SEAL 18. SEAL DET. A 13. WASHER (2) 15. WASHER 17. DOOR LOWER VERTICAL TRIM SHROUD 16. SCREW VIEW. B 145AMM250524.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. E X I T

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-07-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. SERVICE-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the service-door trim shroud assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) RTV 780 (black) Sealant AR PFR31D5900W/PRF 31-3MM Seal AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-006-A (1) Remove the old sealant (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Install the door upper trim shroud (28) with the screws (26) and (29) and washers (27) and (30). (3) Fit the seals (19) and (25) in the correct position on the aft vertical trim shroud (20). NOTE: If necessary, replace them. (4) Install the lateral of the aft vertical trim shroud (20) with the screws (24) and washers (23). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Install the front of the aft vertical trim shroud (20) with the screws (22) and washers (21). (6) Install the door lower vertical trim shroud (17) with the screws (14) and (16) and washers (13) and (15). Refer to VIEW B. (7) Fit the seal (18) in the correct position on the door lower vertical trim shroud (17). NOTE: If necessary replace the seal (18). (8) Install the door lower vertical trim shroud (17) with the screws (9) and (12) and washers (10) and (11). (9) Fit the seal (8) in the correct position on the door forward vertical trim shroud (1). NOTE: If it is necessary replace the seal (8). (10) Install the door forward vertical trim shroud (1) with the screws (3) and washers (2). (11) Install the handle (6) to the door forward vertical trim shroud (1) with the screws (4) and washers (5). (12) Install the acoustic cover (7) with Velcro fasteners. (13) Apply the sealant around the base of the door lower trim shroud (17) and the base of the aft vertical trim shroud (20) (SRM 51-20-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-23-07 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
